word:
I HAVE NOW BROUGHT THIS, AS THE TESTIMONY TELLS ME, TO "THE HIGHER RESPONSIBILITIES." I HAVE BROUGHT IT THERE, AND I LAY IT DOWN THERE; AND IT IS FOR YOU TO DISCHARGE THE RESPONSIBILITIES, AND TO SEARCH THESE THINGS OUT. I AM NOT A MEMBER OF THIS BOARD; YOU ARE MEMBERS; BUT I MUST NOT INCUR THE DISPLEASURE OF GOD BY GOING ALONG, DILLY-DALLYING WITH THINGS THAT ARE WRONG, EVEN THOUGH THE BRETHREN CAN NOT SEE IT. 
                                                                           49
